data.scheme_name: Prime Minister's Employment Generation Programme  - Capital Subsidy for Upgradation  - NER & Hill States  - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides capital subsidy upto 20% of the project cost.
data.eligibility: All micro enterprises having Udyam registration Certificate are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Beneficiary’s contribution must be 10% of project cost. 
  2. Applicant must be above 18 years of age. 
  3. For setting up of project costing above Rs.10 lakh in the Manufacturing sector and above Rs. 5 lakh in the Business /Service sector, the beneficiaries should possess at least VIII standard pass educational qualification. 
  4. Assistance under the scheme is available only for new project. 
  5. Margin Money(subsidy)claimed under PMEGP has to be successfully adjusted on the completion of lock in period of 3 years. 
  6. First loan under PMEGP/REGP/MUDRA has to be successfully repaid in stipulated time. 
  7. The unit is profit making with good turnover.
data.beneficiaries: All micro enterprises having Udyam registration Certificate are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Beneficiary’s contribution must be 10% of project cost. 
  2. Applicant must be above 18 years of age. 
  3. For setting up of project costing above Rs.10 lakh in the Manufacturing sector and above Rs. 5 lakh in the Business /Service sector, the beneficiaries should possess at least VIII standard pass educational qualification. 
  4. Assistance under the scheme is available only for new project. 
  5. Margin Money(subsidy)claimed under PMEGP has to be successfully adjusted on the completion of lock in period of 3 years. 
  6. First loan under PMEGP/REGP/MUDRA has to be successfully repaid in stipulated time. 
  7. The unit is profit making with good turnover.
data.context: This scheme is introduced to generate employment opportunities in rural as well as urban areas of the country through setting up of new self-employment ventures/projects/micro enterprises.
data.objective: The main aim is to provide continuous and sustainable employment to a large segment of traditional and prospective artisans and rural and urban unemployed youth in the country.
data.description:
Scheme provides capital subsidy under PMEGP in the following manner : 

  • Rate of Subsidy in Manufacturing sector : 20% of project cost upto max. of Rs. 20 lakh. 
  • Maximum cost of the project admissible for margin money subsidy under Manufacturing sector for upgradation is Rs. 100 lakh. 
  • Rate of Subsidy in Service sector : 20% of project cost upto max. of Rs. 5 lakh. 
  • Maximum cost of the project admissible for subsidy under Service sector is Rs. 25 lakh.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link :  https://www.kviconline.gov.in/pmegpeportal/pmegphome/index.jsp.
data.funding_mechanism: The Bank will sanction d 95% in case of Special Category of the beneficiary and disburse full amount suitably for setting up of the project.
data.additional_info:
• Business / Trading activities in the form of sales outlets may be permitted in NER, Left wing Extremism (LWE)-affected districts and A & N Islands. 
  • The maximum cost of the project for Business / Trading activities may be Rs.20 lakh. 
  • Transport activities viz purchase of Cab/Van/Boat/Motorboat/Shikara etc. for transportation of tourists or general public will be allowed. 
  • A ceiling of 10% on the extent of projects financed under transport activities.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) 
2. Registration Certificate under respective act 
3. Project report. 
4. Pass Certificate 
5. Identity and Address proof  
6. Caste Certificate  
7. Special Category Certificate  
8. Rural Area Certificate 
9. Other KYC Documents
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: https://www.kviconline.gov.in/pmegpeportal/dynamicdistrict/officeSearchForm.jsp 

Email id: ykbaramatikar.kvic@gov.in

data.location: Assam, Manipur, Tripura, Meghalaya, Nagaland, Jammu and Kashmir, Arunachal Pradesh, Mizoram, Sikkim, Uttarakhand, Himachal Pradesh
data.beneficiary: Specific Manufacturing, Service and Trading Industry  - Proprietorship  - All Location  - Micro
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale  - Up
